attributes.additional_details:
The Liberal Democrats broke everyone's trust by saying they were going to not raise Tuition Fees, when they did, and just proved that politicians do lie, and just want to make everyone vote for them.

Tuition Fees ought to be lowered back to their previous price, or lower, because people go to university to learn things and get degrees. It is a higher education than to what college is, basically.

Lying will not make people vote, because when government parties have been elected, and then they do not do what government parties say they will do, it will just make people not willing to vote until they see CHANGE HAPPEN! Government parties ought to be ashamed, that they make people believe what they say they will do, but they never do.
